EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners: Becoming an MBO Alumni! (1341253574.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners: Becoming an MBO Alumni! (1341253574.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Larry, It has been a pleasure supporting you and your business! We are sorry to see you go, but I personally wanted to share a few important pieces of information with you to help with the transition to alumni status. Should you have another potential project, we can easily re-activate your account. Important Business Center Actions There are just a few important items to review: Once all contributions have been posted, you may have your 401(k) funds transferred to a new retirement plan, or you may elect to continue your portfolio with Fidelity. Employee-side contributions will post to your Fidelity account within two weeks of the last payroll. The employer-side matching and profit sharing will post in the last week of the following month. To manage your retirement options, please contact Fidelity directly at www.401kxpress.com <http://www.401kxpress.com> or via phone at (800) 294-401K. Ways to Stay Connected: I have enjoyed working with you. All of us at MBO Partners hope you stay connected to our community. There are many ways to stay in touch: As an alumni, you still have the ability to freely visit the growing MBO Access Community <https://access.mbopartners.com/welcome>. Here, you can make meaningful connections with other Associates and Clients, while having access to excellent resources and perks. Join our Webinar Series <http://info.mbopartners.com/2012SeriesSignUp.html?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonsqvLZKXonjHpfsX56%2BUtW6G1lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ASMBmI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> for premier independent consulting related content, and follow us on Facebook <http://hr-hr.facebook.com/mbopartners>, Twitter <http://twitter.com/#!/MBOpartners>, and LinkedIn. When you come back to MBO Partners for your next project, just let us know that you liked or followed us on our social networks and we’ll send you a $25.00 Amazon Gift Card. Also be sure to catch up with other MBO Associates in our Meet the Independents Series <http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html>, which profiles Independents from all 50 states! Pass It On, and Get Rewarded: We appreciate your business, and wanted you to know that as an MBO alumni, you still qualify to earn a bonus for every successful Associate you refer to us. Please click here <http://www.mbopartners.com/referral-program> to learn more about why many of our Associates refer us to peers, colleagues and friends. I hope we’ll see you again – and don’t forget that your next project opportunity can be run through MBO. Once you secure the work, you can simply reply to this email and I’ll take it from there, so please keep it handy! Please let me know if you have any further questions. We wish you well and I hope to hear from you soon. Best wishes,Sara (on behalf of Nicolette Tyalor)___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. ________________________________________From: Larry ColenSent: Sunday, July 01, 2012 8:06:17 PM (UTC-05:00) Eastern Time (US & Canada)To: Nicolette TaylorSubject: Re: paperwork question On Jun 22, 2012, at 6:28 AM, Nicolette Taylor wrote: > Hi Larry,> > I hope all is well! Could you please let me know if you are continuing to work with Tehama Wireless or plan on running any other clients through MBO at this time (or in the very near future)? If not I will close your account and place you in Alumni status, and if another project comes through it is quick and easy to get you re-activated. Sorry about the delay. I haven't heard anything from them in a while. I've never even heard if they tried running my software. It seems to be dead for now. Thanks, Larry> > Please advise.> > Thank you,> Nicolette> > -----Original Message-----> From: Larry Colen [mailto:lrc@red4est.com] <mailto:[mailto:lrc@red4est.com]>> Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2012 7:58 PM> To: Nicolette Taylor> Subject: paperwork question> > Nicolette,> > I'm dealing with some unemployment issues, and need a printout of what days I worked and charged how many hours, or dollars.> > I'm having trouble finding out how to print that out on the website. Can you point me in the right direction?> > Thanks,> Larry> > --> Larry Colen lrc@red4est.com <mailto:lrc@red4est.com> sent from i4est> > > > --Larry Colen lrc@red4est.com <mailto:lrc@red4est.com> sent from i4est
